monster.name: Evil Mage

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp
• 1st Level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile
• 2nd Level (3 slots): hold person, misty step

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage.

monster.spells: light, mage hand, shocking grasp, charm person, magic missile, hold person, misty step

monster.name: Mormesk the Wraith
monster.resist: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The wraith can move through an object or another creature, but can't stop there.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Life Drain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. If this attack reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

monster.name: Nezznar the Black Spider

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: Nezznar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: Nezznar has disadvantage on attack rolls when he or his target is in sunlight.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Nezznar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nezznar is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). Nezznar has the following spells prepared from the wizard's spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp
• 1st Level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield

action.name: Spider Staff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

monster.spells: dancing lights, darkness, faerie fire, mage hand, ray of frost, shocking grasp, mage armor, magic missile, shield, invisibility, suggestion

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ruffian makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100 ft./400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: When an attacker hits Sildar with a melee attack and Sildar can see the attacker, he can roll 1d6 and add the number rolled to his AC against the triggering attack, provided that he's wielding a melee weapon.
